snippet: “I get bamboozled and frazzled by my grandchildren when they visit: Invariably, they have messed up my computer, my iPad, my iPhone and my iPod.”
abstract: Gerald Eskenazi essay on the frustration of having visiting grandchildren use electronic gadgets like iPads and iPhones and then alter settings and preferences without asking.
lead_paragraph: “I get bamboozled and frazzled by my grandchildren when they visit: Invariably, they have messed up my computer, my iPad, my iPhone and my iPod.”

headline.main: Grandchildren Arrive. A Medusa’s Head of Wires Soon Follows.
headline.print_headline: Grandchildren Arrive. A Medusa’s Head of Wires Soon Follows.
